## World Container Index (WCI)

The [Drewry World Container Index (WCI)](https://www.drewry.co.uk/supply-chain-advisors/world-container-index-weekly-update) measures the bi-weekly ocean freight rate movements of 40-foot containers in seven major maritime lanes. It is expressed as an average price per 40-foot container (in US$). The following article explains the relationship between WCI and inflation rate.

* [美通脹放緩趨勢非理所當然](https://nbviewer.org/github/stevenkhwun/Analyzing-Stocks-Using-R/blob/main/Reference-Technical/20240822_%E7%BE%8E%E9%80%9A%E8%84%B9%E6%94%BE%E7%B7%A9%E8%B6%A8%E5%8B%A2%E9%9D%9E%E7%90%86%E6%89%80%E7%95%B6%E7%84%B6.pdf)
